topics.body:
"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534785d66368723388620200#post_534785d66368723388620200
Let's see: war, war, war, more war, politics, war, people being stupid, more war, kid in a KKK costume, more war.

Humanity in a nutshell. also war.
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e

topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53478ae9636872646eeb0000#post_53478ae9636872646eeb0000
You have to admit though; we're a insanely resilient species and it's probably the most unique thing about us.

If there are aliens and they are aware of us their reaction to us is probably along the lines of, "How the fuck are you guys still alive?!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53479245636872299de00200#post_53479245636872299de00200
You could say the same for many other creatures as well. Ants and bees for example.

"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53478ae9636872646eeb0000#post_53478ae9636872646eeb0000
The only reason the news is filled with shit like that is that no one reports on the positive things.

topics.body:
Humans are relatively peaceful creatures actually. 
We just don't know ourselves

It's REALLY hard for a human to kill another human.

topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347d02d6368723d44740100#post_5347d02d6368723d44740100
I mean that if you were to give the average human a gun and told them to kill someone, they wouldn't. Even soldiers "miss" shots every now and then.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347d3b0636872267d000400#post_5347d3b0636872267d000400
Well of course. People don't kill for no reason; hatred, jealousy, greed, differences in ideology, competition for resources, and insanity are all means to do so. The thing is, there is A LOT of the aforementioned things in this world.

topics.body:
Imagine playing a game.
It can be any kind of game with an actual plot.
But one difference...

You play as the hero's sidekick instead.
That means, you follow him everywhere, carry him stuff and let him make the dumb and noble choices.

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347de0b63687249888b0100#post_5347de0b63687249888b0100

topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53478ae9636872646eeb0000#post_53478ae9636872646eeb0000

10/10 actually missing the breaks in such things or the heroism in people actually taking a stand against bullshit.

Or the delightful warm irony in the Klan rally picture.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347e7b66368727530a20100#post_5347e7b66368727530a20100
Call me a cynic but like the news I tend to focus only on the bad things, mostly because I happen to actually be sensitive to such things instead of trying to simply weigh them again the good. Saving a kid from a burning building is not going to unbomb a city full of innocent people. Giving money to the poor is not going to free a country for an evil dictator. The fact that these things happen even if relatively rare is still enough to justify scorn for humanity.

Also most people here think war is cool, which makes me sick to my stomach. I mean seriously, just look at the images of ponies in tanks and with rifles and such. Also Nazi ponies...
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e

topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347ee796368722ae0570100#post_5347ee796368722ae0570100

I dont like people Who cant diferentiate fantasy from reality.

Just because i love to play as panzer elite and kill lots of americans in a videogame doesnt mean i love war in real life
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347f8fe636872653cef0000#post_5347f8fe636872653cef0000
Even so, just the fact that people would make a game about war and play it as a form of enjoyment just boggles my mind.
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e

topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347fa9c636872666b560100#post_5347fa9c636872666b560100

Humans love violence (NOT ALL so dont go all im special argument) and videogames or movies are a good way to live those fantasies without nobody really dying.

Others simply enjoy the adrenaline, and war scenarios give lots.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5347fb8a636872655b790100#post_5347fb8a636872655b790100
I understand that it's just a game but as far as saying it's fantasy is only a half truth. Yes the game itself may just be fiction but it's based (sometimes very closely) on something real. Sorry but war is horrible. As someone who comes from a military family, I can tell you, it's not a source of entertainment or fun.
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e
